channel.description: Recent content in craft on J A C K

item.title: Budget Espresso Setup
item.description: Espresso is a meditative experience. It’s as much about understanding fluid dynamics as practicing precise handiwork.

item.title: 2 Minute Intro to Coffee
item.description: Coffee is alchemy. A hobby that combines art, science, and just the right amount of voodoo.

item.title: Shipping as a habit
item.description: I’ve worked on a lot of projects (3d printing, grooming habits, video calling), but don’t publish enough.

item.title: The Bike Kitchen serves a 5 course meal - building a bike from parts
item.description: The San Francisco Bike Kitchen is where you find mechanical magic.

item.title: The Most Foldable Ukulele in the World
item.description: A few years ago, I started playing guitar at university and wanted to keep going when I moved around.

item.title: The Adler Special Typewriter
item.description: A gift that the previous owners of my home left. I didn’t think much of it until I watched the documentary California Typewriter on a flight!

item.title: DIY camera finger strap to travel real light
item.description: I just bought a used Fujifilm X70 in an attempt to save on space and weight.
